column3: Whoops, missed the assignment here (saw your IRC ping though, thanks!). utACK a4d1c9f0417e25b0aac937f07edf2bb642b84f09. Yes, Much of this stuff goes away with libevent. I like the move out of compat as well. For anything that libevent doesn't end up absorbing, it'd be nice to make everything else local the same way.
